entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of drizzle. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of drizzle this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of drizzle. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle this evening and after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle after midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
